00063 #define NEXT_TILE_CHECK_DELAY       700

00067 void OutputDebugInfoForTurnBasedNextTileWaiting( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00068 {
00069       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && (pSoldier->usPathDataSize > 0) )
00070       {
00071             UINT32      uiLoop;
00072             UINT16      usTemp;
00073             UINT16      usNewGridNo;
00074 
00075             usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) );
00076 
00077             // provide more info!!
00078             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("  Soldier path size %d, index %d", pSoldier->usPathDataSize, pSoldier->usPathIndex ) );
00079             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("  Who is at blocked gridno: %d", WhoIsThere2( usNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) );
00080 
00081             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < pSoldier->usPathDataSize; uiLoop++ )
00082             {
00083                   if ( uiLoop > pSoldier->usPathIndex )
00084                   {                             
00085                         usTemp = NewGridNo( usTemp, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ uiLoop ] ) );
00086                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("  Soldier path[%d]: %d == gridno %d", uiLoop, pSoldier->usPathingData[uiLoop], usTemp ) );
00087                   }
00088                   else if ( uiLoop == pSoldier->usPathIndex )
00089                   {
00090                         usTemp = usNewGridNo;
00091                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("  Soldier path[%d]: %d == gridno %d", uiLoop, pSoldier->usPathingData[uiLoop], usTemp ) );
00092                   }
00093                   else
00094                   {
00095                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("  Soldier path[%d]: %d", uiLoop, pSoldier->usPathingData[uiLoop] ) );
00096                   }
00097             }
00098 
00099       }
00100 }

00105 void SetDelayedTileWaiting( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sCauseGridNo, INT8 bValue )
00106 {
00107       UINT8       ubPerson;
00108 
00109       // Cancel AI Action
00110       // CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
00111 
00112       pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = bValue;
00113       pSoldier->sDelayedMovementCauseGridNo = sCauseGridNo;
00114 
00115       RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->NextTileCounter, NEXT_TILE_CHECK_DELAY );
00116 
00117       // ATE: Now update realtime movement speed....
00118       // check if guy exists here...
00119       ubPerson = WhoIsThere2( sCauseGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00120 
00121       // There may not be anybody there, but it's reserved by them!
00122       if ( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sCauseGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_MOVEMENT_RESERVED ) )
00123       {
00124             ubPerson = gpWorldLevelData[ sCauseGridNo ].ubReservedSoldierID;
00125       }
00126 
00127       if ( ubPerson != NOBODY )
00128       {
00129             // if they are our own team members ( both )
00130             if ( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00131             {
00132                   // Here we have another guy.... save his stats so we can use them for
00133                   // speed determinations....
00134                   pSoldier->bOverrideMoveSpeed = ubPerson;
00135                   pSoldier->fUseMoverrideMoveSpeed = TRUE;
00136             }
00137       }
00138 }

00141 void SetFinalTile( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fGivenUp )
00142 {
00143       // OK, If we were waiting for stuff, do it here...
00144 
00145       // ATE: Disabled stuff below, made obsolete by timeout...
00146       //if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo  )
00147       //{
00148       //    pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 0;
00149       //    gbNumMercsUntilWaitingOver--;
00150       //}
00151       pSoldier->sFinalDestination = pSoldier->sGridNo;
00152 
00153       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00154             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00155             {
00156                   OutputDebugInfoForTurnBasedNextTileWaiting( pSoldier );
00157             }
00158       #endif
00159 
00160   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum  && fGivenUp )
00161   {
00162             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH_FOR_MERC ], pSoldier->name );
00163   }
00164 
00165       EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
00166 
00167 }

00170 void MarkMovementReserved( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
00171 {
00172       // Check if we have one reserrved already, and free it first!
00173       if ( pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo != NOWHERE )
00174       {
00175             UnMarkMovementReserved( pSoldier );
00176       }
00177 
00178       // For single-tiled mercs, set this gridno
00179       gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_MOVEMENT_RESERVED;
00180 
00181       // Save soldier's reserved ID #
00182       gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubReservedSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
00183 
00184       pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo = sGridNo;
00185 }
00186 
00187 void UnMarkMovementReserved( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00188 {
00189       INT16 sNewGridNo;
00190 
00191       sNewGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS(pSoldier->dYPos, pSoldier->dXPos );
00192 
00193       // OK, if NOT in fence anim....
00194       if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == HOPFENCE && pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo != sNewGridNo )
00195       {
00196             return;
00197       }
00198 
00199       // For single-tiled mercs, unset this gridno
00200       // See if we have one reserved!
00201       if ( pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo != NOWHERE )
00202       {
00203             gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_MOVEMENT_RESERVED);
00204 
00205             pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo = NOWHERE;
00206       }
00207 }

00209 INT8 TileIsClear( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDirection,  INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00210 {
00211       UINT8       ubPerson;
00212       INT16       sTempDestGridNo;
00213       INT16       sNewGridNo;
00214       BOOLEAN     fSwapInDoor = FALSE;
00215 
00216       if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00217       {
00218             return( MOVE_TILE_CLEAR );
00219       }
00220 
00221       ubPerson = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel );
00222 
00223 
00224       if ( ubPerson != NO_SOLDIER )
00225       {
00226             // If this us?
00227             if ( ubPerson != pSoldier->ubID )
00228             {
00229                   // OK, set flag indicating we are blocked by a merc....
00230                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum ) // CJC: shouldn't this be in all cases???
00231             //if ( 0 )
00232                   {
00233                         pSoldier->fBlockedByAnotherMerc = TRUE;
00234                         // Set direction we were trying to goto
00235                         pSoldier->bBlockedByAnotherMercDirection = bDirection;
00236 
00237                         // Are we only temporarily blocked?
00238                         // Check if our final destination is = our gridno
00239                         if ( ( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination == MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sGridNo )  )
00240                         {
00241                               return( MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED );
00242                         }
00243                         else
00244                         {
00245                               // OK, if buddy who is blocking us is trying to move too...
00246                               // And we are in opposite directions...
00247                               if ( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->fBlockedByAnotherMerc && MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->bBlockedByAnotherMercDirection == gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] )
00248                               {
00249                                     // OK, try and get a path around buddy....
00250                                     // We have to temporarily make buddy stopped...
00251                                     sTempDestGridNo = MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination;
00252                                     MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination = MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sGridNo;
00253 
00254                                     if ( PlotPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints ) )
00255                                     {
00256                                           pSoldier->bPathStored = FALSE;
00257                                           // OK, make guy go here...
00258                                           EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
00259                                           // Restore final dest....
00260                                           MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination = sTempDestGridNo;
00261                                           pSoldier->fBlockedByAnotherMerc = FALSE;
00262 
00263                                           // Is the next tile blocked too?
00264                                           sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] ) );
00265 
00266                                           return( TileIsClear( pSoldier, (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ], sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel ) );
00267                                     } 
00268                                     else
00269                                     {
00270 
00271                                                 // Not for multi-tiled things...
00272                                                 if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE ) )
00273                                                 {
00274                                                       // Is the next movement cost for a door?
00275                                                       if ( DoorTravelCost( pSoldier, sGridNo, gubWorldMovementCosts[ sGridNo ][ bDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ], (BOOLEAN)( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum ), NULL ) == TRAVELCOST_DOOR )
00276                                                       {
00277                                                             fSwapInDoor = TRUE;
00278                                                       }
00279 
00280                                                       // If we are to swap and we're near a door, open door first and then close it...?
00281 
00282 
00283                                                       // Swap now!
00284                                                       MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->fBlockedByAnotherMerc = FALSE;
00285 
00286                                                       // Restore final dest....
00287                                                       MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination = sTempDestGridNo;
00288                         
00289                                                       // Swap merc positions.....
00290                                                       SwapMercPositions( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubPerson ] );
00291                                                       
00292                                                       // With these two guys swapped, they should try and continue on their way....
00293                                                       // Start them both again along their way...
00294                                                       EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
00295                                                       EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ], MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination, MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->usUIMovementMode );                           
00296                                                 }
00297                                     }
00298                               }
00299                               return( MOVE_TILE_TEMP_BLOCKED );
00300                         }
00301                   }
00302                   else
00303                   {
00304                         //return( MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED );
00305                         // ATE: OK, put some smartshere...
00306                         // If we are waiting for more than a few times, change to stationary...
00307                         if ( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->fDelayedMovement >= 105 )
00308                         {
00309                               // Set to special 'I want to walk through people' value
00310                               pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = 150;
00311 
00312                               return( MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED );
00313                         }
00314                         if ( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sGridNo == MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination )
00315                         {
00316                               return( MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED );
00317                         }
00318                         return( MOVE_TILE_TEMP_BLOCKED );
00319                   }
00320             }
00321       }
00322 
00323       if ( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_MOVEMENT_RESERVED ) )
00324       {
00325             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubReservedSoldierID != pSoldier->ubID )
00326             {
00327                   return( MOVE_TILE_TEMP_BLOCKED );
00328             }
00329       }
00330 
00331       // Are we clear of structs?
00332       if ( !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00333       {
00334                   // ATE: Fence cost is an exclusiuon here....
00335                   if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sGridNo ][ bDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] != TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
00336                   {
00337                         // ATE: HIdden structs - we do something here... reveal it!
00338                         if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sGridNo ][ bDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] == TRAVELCOST_HIDDENOBSTACLE )
00339                         {
00340                               gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_REVEALED;
00341                               gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_REDRAW;
00342                               SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_MARKED);
00343                               RecompileLocalMovementCosts( (UINT16)sGridNo );
00344                         }
00345 
00346                         // Unset flag for blocked by soldier...
00347                         pSoldier->fBlockedByAnotherMerc = FALSE;
00348                         return( MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED );
00349                   }
00350                   else
00351                   {
00352 #if 0
00353                         // Check if there is a reserved marker here at least....
00354                         sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( bDirection ) );
00355 
00356                         if ( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sNewGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_MOVEMENT_RESERVED ) )
00357                         {
00358                               if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sNewGridNo ].ubReservedSoldierID != pSoldier->ubID )
00359                               {
00360                                     return( MOVE_TILE_TEMP_BLOCKED );
00361                               }
00362                         }
00363 #endif
00364                   }
00365       }
00366 
00367       // Unset flag for blocked by soldier...
00368       pSoldier->fBlockedByAnotherMerc = FALSE;
00369 
00370       return( MOVE_TILE_CLEAR );
00371 
00372 }

00375 
00376 BOOLEAN HandleNextTile( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDirection, INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sFinalDestTile )
00377 {
00378       INT8 bBlocked;
00379       INT16 bOverTerrainType;
00380 
00381       // Check for blocking if in realtime 
00382       ///if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00383 
00384       // ATE: If not on visible tile, return clear ( for path out of map )
00385       if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
00386       {
00387             return( TRUE );
00388       }
00389 
00390       // If animation state is crow, iall is clear
00391       if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY )
00392       {
00393             return( TRUE );
00394       }
00395 
00396       {
00397             bBlocked = TileIsClear( pSoldier, bDirection, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00398 
00399             // Check if we are blocked...
00400             if ( bBlocked != MOVE_TILE_CLEAR )
00401             {
00402                   // Is the next gridno our destination?
00403                   // OK: Let's check if we are NOT walking off screen
00404                   if ( sGridNo == sFinalDestTile && pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo == 0 && (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination == NOWHERE) )
00405                   {
00406                         // Yah, well too bad, stop here.
00407                         SetFinalTile( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE );
00408 
00409                         return( FALSE );
00410                   }
00411                   // CHECK IF they are stationary
00412                   else if ( bBlocked == MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED )
00413                   {
00414                         // Stationary, 
00415                         {
00416                               INT16 sOldFinalDest;
00417 
00418                               // Maintain sFinalDest....
00419                               sOldFinalDest = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;                      
00420                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00421                                     if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00422                                     {
00423                                           OutputDebugInfoForTurnBasedNextTileWaiting( pSoldier );
00424                                     }
00425                               #endif
00426                               EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
00427                               // Restore...
00428                               pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sOldFinalDest;
00429 
00430                               SetDelayedTileWaiting( pSoldier, sGridNo, 1 );
00431 
00432                               return( FALSE );
00433                         }
00434                   }
00435                   else
00436                   {
00437                         {
00438                               INT16 sOldFinalDest;
00439 
00440                               // Maintain sFinalDest....
00441                               sOldFinalDest = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;                      
00442                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00443                                     if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00444                                     {
00445                                           OutputDebugInfoForTurnBasedNextTileWaiting( pSoldier );
00446                                     }
00447                               #endif
00448                               EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
00449                               // Restore...
00450                               pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sOldFinalDest;
00451                               
00452                               // Setting to two means: try and wait until this tile becomes free....
00453                               SetDelayedTileWaiting( pSoldier, sGridNo, 100 );
00454                         }
00455 
00456                         return( FALSE );
00457                   }
00458             }
00459             else
00460             {
00461                   // Mark this tile as reserverd ( until we get there! )
00462                   if ( !( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) ) )
00463                   {
00464                         MarkMovementReserved( pSoldier, sGridNo );
00465                   }
00466 
00467                   bOverTerrainType = GetTerrainType( sGridNo );
00468 
00469                   // Check if we are going into water!
00470                   if ( bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER || bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER || bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
00471                   {
00472                         // Check if we are of prone or crawl height and change stance accordingly....
00473                         switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
00474                         {
00475                               case ANIM_PRONE:
00476                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
00477 
00478                                     // Change height to stand
00479                                     pSoldier->fContinueMoveAfterStanceChange = TRUE;
00480                                     SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
00481                                     break;
00482                         }
00483 
00484                         // Check animation
00485                         // Change to walking
00486                         if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == RUNNING )
00487                         {
00488                               ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, WALKING, 0 , FALSE );
00489                         }
00490                   }
00491             }
00492       }
00493       return( TRUE );
00494 }

00497 
00498 BOOLEAN HandleNextTileWaiting( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00499 {
00500       // Buddy is waiting to continue his path
00501       INT8        bBlocked, bPathBlocked;
00502       INT16       sCost;
00503       INT16   sNewGridNo, sCheckGridNo;
00504       UINT8       ubDirection, bCauseDirection;
00505       UINT8       ubPerson;
00506       UINT8       fFlags = 0;
00507 
00508  
00509       if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement )
00510       {
00511             if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->NextTileCounter, NEXT_TILE_CHECK_DELAY ) )
00512             {
00513                   RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->NextTileCounter, NEXT_TILE_CHECK_DELAY );
00514 
00515                   // Get direction from gridno...
00516                   bCauseDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sDelayedMovementCauseGridNo );
00517 
00518                   bBlocked = TileIsClear( pSoldier, bCauseDirection, pSoldier->sDelayedMovementCauseGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00519 
00520                   // If we are waiting for a temp blockage.... continue to wait
00521                   if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement >= 100 &&  bBlocked == MOVE_TILE_TEMP_BLOCKED )
00522                   {
00523                         // ATE: Increment 1
00524                         pSoldier->fDelayedMovement++;
00525 
00526                         // Are we close enough to give up? ( and are a pc )
00527                         if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement > 120 )
00528                         {
00529                               // Quit...
00530                               SetFinalTile( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, TRUE );
00531                               pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
00532                         }
00533                         return( TRUE );
00534                   }
00535 
00536                   // Try new path if anything but temp blockage!
00537                   if ( bBlocked != MOVE_TILE_TEMP_BLOCKED )
00538                   {
00539                         // Set to normal delay
00540                         if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement >= 100 && pSoldier->fDelayedMovement != 150 )
00541                         {
00542                               pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = 1;
00543                         }
00544 
00545                         // Default to pathing through people
00546                         fFlags = PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE;
00547 
00548                         // Now, if we are in the state where we are desparently trying to get out...
00549                         // Use other flag
00550                         // CJC: path-through-people includes ignoring person at dest
00551                         /*
00552                         if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement >= 150 )
00553                         {
00554                               fFlags = PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST;
00555                         }
00556                         */
00557 
00558                         // Check destination first!
00559                         if ( pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination == pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
00560                         {
00561                               // on last lap of scripted move, make sure we get to final dest
00562                               sCheckGridNo = pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination;                           
00563                         }
00564                         else if (!NewOKDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ))
00565                         {
00566                               if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement >= 150 )
00567                               {
00568                                     // OK, look around dest for the first one!
00569                                     sCheckGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, 6, &ubDirection );
00570 
00571                                     if ( sCheckGridNo == NOWHERE )
00572                                     {
00573                                           // If this is nowhere, try harder!
00574                                           sCheckGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, 16, &ubDirection );
00575                                     }
00576                               }
00577                               else
00578                               {
00579                                     // OK, look around dest for the first one!
00580                                     sCheckGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotThroughPeople( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, 6, &ubDirection );
00581 
00582                                     if ( sCheckGridNo == NOWHERE )
00583                                     {
00584                                           // If this is nowhere, try harder!
00585                                           sCheckGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotThroughPeople( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, 16, &ubDirection );
00586                                     }
00587                               }
00588                         }
00589                         else
00590                         {
00591                               sCheckGridNo = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;
00592                         }
00593 
00594                         // Try another path to destination
00595                         // ATE: Allow path to exit grid!
00596                         if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo == 1 && gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO )
00597                         {
00598                               gfPlotPathToExitGrid = TRUE;
00599                         }
00600 
00601                         sCost = (INT16) FindBestPath( pSoldier, sCheckGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, fFlags );
00602                         gfPlotPathToExitGrid = FALSE;
00603                         
00604                         // Can we get there
00605                         if ( sCost > 0 )
00606                         {
00607                               // Is the next tile blocked too?
00608                               sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] ) );
00609 
00610                               bPathBlocked = TileIsClear( pSoldier, (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ], sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00611 
00612                               if ( bPathBlocked == MOVE_TILE_STATIONARY_BLOCKED )
00613                               {
00614                                     // Try to path around everyone except dest person
00615 
00616                                     if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo == 1 && gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO )
00617                                     {
00618                                           gfPlotPathToExitGrid = TRUE;
00619                                     }
00620 
00621                                     sCost = (INT16) FindBestPath( pSoldier, sCheckGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST );
00622 
00623                                     gfPlotPathToExitGrid = FALSE;
00624 
00625                                     // Is the next tile in this new path blocked too?
00626                                     sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] ) );
00627 
00628                                     bPathBlocked = TileIsClear( pSoldier, (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ], sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00629 
00630                                     // now working with a path which does not go through people                   
00631                                     pSoldier->ubDelayedMovementFlags &= (~DELAYED_MOVEMENT_FLAG_PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE);
00632                               }
00633                               else
00634                               {
00635                                     // path through people worked fine
00636                                     if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement < 150 )
00637                                     {
00638                                           pSoldier->ubDelayedMovementFlags |= DELAYED_MOVEMENT_FLAG_PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE;
00639                                     }
00640                               }
00641 
00642                               // Are we clear?
00643                               if ( bPathBlocked == MOVE_TILE_CLEAR )
00644                               {
00645                                     // Go for it path!
00646                                     if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo == 1 && gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO )
00647                                     {
00648                                           gfPlotPathToExitGrid = TRUE;
00649                                     }
00650 
00651                                     //pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
00652                                     // ATE: THis will get set in EENT_GetNewSoldierPath....
00653                                     pSoldier->usActionData = sCheckGridNo;
00654 
00655                                     pSoldier->bPathStored = FALSE;
00656 
00657                                     EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sCheckGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
00658                                     gfPlotPathToExitGrid = FALSE;
00659 
00660                                     return( TRUE );
00661                               }
00662                         }
00663 
00664                         pSoldier->fDelayedMovement++;
00665 
00666                         if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement == 99 )
00667                         {
00668                               // Cap at 99
00669                               pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = 99;
00670                         }
00671 
00672                         // Do we want to force a swap?
00673                         if (pSoldier->fDelayedMovement == 3 && (pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE || gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode) )
00674                         {
00675                               // with person who is in the way?
00676                               ubPerson = WhoIsThere2( pSoldier->sDelayedMovementCauseGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00677 
00678                               // if either on a mission from god, or two AI guys not on stationary...
00679                               if ( ubPerson != NOBODY && ( pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord != 0 || ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bOrders != STATIONARY && MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->bOrders != STATIONARY ) || (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode && !(MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->bOrders == STATIONARY ) ) ) )
00680                               {                             
00681                                     // Swap now!
00682                                     //MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->fBlockedByAnotherMerc = FALSE;
00683 
00684                                     // Restore final dest....
00685                                     //MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination = sTempDestGridNo;
00686 
00687                                     // Swap merc positions.....
00688                                     SwapMercPositions( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubPerson ] );
00689                                     
00690                                     // With these two guys swapped, we should try to continue on our way....                        
00691                                     pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
00692 
00693                                     // We must calculate the path here so that we can give it the "through people" parameter
00694                                     if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode && pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination == NOWHERE )
00695                                     {
00696                                           FindBestPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
00697                                     }
00698                                     else if ( pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE && !FindBestPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
00699                                     {
00700                                           // check to see if we're there now!
00701                                           if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination )
00702                                           {
00703                                                 NPCReachedDestination( pSoldier, FALSE );
00704                                                 pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00705                                                 pSoldier->usNextActionData = 500;
00706                                                 return( TRUE );
00707                                           }
00708                                     }
00709                                     pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE;
00710 
00711                                     EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
00712                                     //EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( MercPtrs[ ubPerson ], MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->sFinalDestination, MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->usUIMovementMode );                         
00713                               }
00714 
00715                         }
00716 
00717                         // Are we close enough to give up? ( and are a pc )
00718                         if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement > 20 && pSoldier->fDelayedMovement != 150)
00719                         {
00720                               if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sFinalDestination ) < 5 && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00721                               {
00722                                     // Quit...
00723                                     SetFinalTile( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE );
00724                                     pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
00725                               }
00726                         }
00727 
00728                         // Are we close enough to give up? ( and are a pc )
00729                         if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement > 170 )
00730                         {
00731                               if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sFinalDestination ) < 5 && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00732                               {
00733                                     // Quit...
00734                                     SetFinalTile( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE );
00735                                     pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
00736                               }
00737                         }
00738 
00739                   }
00740             }
00741       }
00742       return( TRUE );
00743 }
00744 
00745 
00746 BOOLEAN TeleportSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fForce )
00747 {
00748       INT16 sX, sY;
00749 
00750       // Check dest...
00751       if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, 0 ) || fForce )
00752       {
00753             // TELEPORT TO THIS LOCATION!
00754             sX = CenterX( sGridNo );
00755             sY = CenterY( sGridNo );
00756             EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, (FLOAT) sX, (FLOAT) sY );     
00757 
00758             pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sGridNo;
00759 
00760             // Make call to FOV to update items...
00761             RevealRoofsAndItems(pSoldier, TRUE, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel, TRUE );
00762       
00763             // Handle sight!
00764             HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK | SIGHT_RADIO);
00765 
00766             // Cancel services...
00767             GivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
00768 
00769             // Change light....
00770             if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
00771             {
00772                   if(pSoldier->iLight!=(-1))
00773                         LightSpriteRoofStatus(pSoldier->iLight, FALSE );
00774             }
00775             else
00776             {
00777                   if(pSoldier->iLight!=(-1))
00778                         LightSpriteRoofStatus(pSoldier->iLight, TRUE );
00779             }
00780             return( TRUE );
00781       }
00782 
00783       return( FALSE );
00784 }
00785 
00786 // Swaps 2 soldier positions...
00787 void SwapMercPositions( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier1, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier2 )
00788 {
00789       INT16 sGridNo1, sGridNo2;
00790 
00791       // OK, save positions...
00792       sGridNo1 = pSoldier1->sGridNo;
00793       sGridNo2 = pSoldier2->sGridNo;
00794 
00795       // OK, remove each.....
00796       RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier1 );
00797       RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier2 );
00798 
00799       // OK, test OK destination for each.......
00800       if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier1, sGridNo2, TRUE, 0 ) && NewOKDestination( pSoldier2, sGridNo1, TRUE, 0 ) )
00801       {
00802             // OK, call teleport function for each.......
00803             TeleportSoldier( pSoldier1, sGridNo2, FALSE );
00804             TeleportSoldier( pSoldier2, sGridNo1, FALSE );
00805       }
00806       else
00807       {
00808             // Place back...
00809             TeleportSoldier( pSoldier1, sGridNo1, TRUE );
00810             TeleportSoldier( pSoldier2, sGridNo2, TRUE );
00811       }
00812 }
00813 
00814 
00815 BOOLEAN CanExchangePlaces( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier1, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier2, BOOLEAN fShow )
00816 {
00817       // NB checks outside of this function 
00818       if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier1, AP_EXCHANGE_PLACES, 0, fShow ) ){
00819         if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier2, AP_EXCHANGE_PLACES, 0, fShow ) ){
00820             if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier2->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) )
00821                   return( FALSE );
00822 
00823             if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier1->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
00824                   return( FALSE );
00825 
00826             if ( pSoldier2->bSide == 0 )
00827               return( TRUE );
00828 
00829             // hehe - don't allow animals to exchange places
00830             if ( pSoldier2->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_ANIMAL ) )
00831                   return( FALSE );
00832 
00833             // must NOT be hostile, must NOT have stationary orders OR militia team, must be >= OKLIFE
00834             if( pSoldier2->bNeutral && pSoldier2->bLife >= OKLIFE && 
00835                   pSoldier2->ubCivilianGroup != HICKS_CIV_GROUP && 
00836                   ( ( pSoldier2->bOrders != STATIONARY || pSoldier2->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM ) || 
00837                   ( pSoldier2->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE && pSoldier2->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != pSoldier2->sGridNo ) )
00838               )
00839                   return( TRUE );
00840 
00841             if ( fShow ){
00842                   if ( pSoldier2->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
00843                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ REFUSE_EXCHANGE_PLACES ] );
00844                   else
00845                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[3], pSoldier2->name );
00846             }
00847 
00848             // ATE: OK, reduce this guy's next ai counter....
00849             pSoldier2->uiAIDelay = 100;
00850             return( FALSE );
00851         }else{
00852               return( FALSE );
00853         }
00854       }
00855       // if SirTech wouldn't setup your nested if statements so messily then perhaps wierd code like this
00856       //    could be avoided... cleaned up the ifs too (jonathanl)
00857       /*
00858       else
00859       {
00860             return( FALSE );
00861       }
00862       return( TRUE );
00863       */
00864       return FALSE;
00865 }
